title: Looking for mates for 5v5 Team
body:
Hey guys,
Me and 2 Friends want to found a ranked team.We are still looking for 2 mates!
We need Mid lane and Jungle!We are 14 years old and from Germany.We cant speak 
english that good, but I think its enough to communicate.
Hope to write with you soon! :D
